de.malkusch.localized.event

Class AbstractEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.malkusch.localized.event.AbstractEventListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteEventListener, ReadEventListener, WriteEventListener

    public abstract class AbstractEventListener
extends Object
    Base class for event handling. This class dispatches the event to the @Localized fields of the event's entity.
    Since:
    0.2.8
    Author:
    Markus Malkusch

    • Method Detail

      • handleField

        protected abstract void handleField(org.hibernate.StatelessSession session,
               Field field,
               Object entity,
               LocalizedProperty property)
                             throws LocalizedException
        Handles the event for each @Localized field. This method has a separate Session as Hibernate's event system seems to break when using the same Session. The session runs on the same Connection, i.e. in the same transaction.
        Throws:
        LocalizedException

      • handleFields

        protected <T extends org.hibernate.event.spi.AbstractEvent> void handleFields(T event,
                                                                  Object entity,
                                                                  Serializable id)
        Dispatches an event for each @Localized field. The Hibernate event callback should be forwarded to this method.
        See Also:
        handleField(StatelessSession, Field, Object, LocalizedProperty)
